roleset.name: slow

roles.note: Arg0 most likely with the verb.

role.descr: entity in slow motion (may require concatenation)

example.name: arg1 with concatenation
example.text: He is always slow to reimburse us.

roleset.note: Reframed by Julia based on BOLT-1, slow-v.01

roleset.name: unskilled/not very smart

role.descr: domain in which arg1 is slow/unskilled

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1.

example.name: arg1
example.text: I 'm kinda slow , I have n't been following the news for the past couple of days .

example.name: both args
example.text: How would I be able to do well on the CSAT if I am slow at math?
